content.rendered:
Retail Banker | Tulsa Area
  • 2-3 years sales experience
  • Positions available in Tulsa, Broken Arrow, Bixby, Glenpool and Bartlesville
  • Business to Business or upselling is a plus
  • Also needing bilingual applicants
  • Great growth opportunity
  • $11-$12/hr + commission
